statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback_ratings;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT challenge_id, rating, date_submitted FROM user_feedback_ratings ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE challenge_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, feedback, rating, date_submitted FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, feedback, date_submitted FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, rating, feedback FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE user_id = 123 AND date_submitted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM user_feedback_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING MAX(rating) > 4
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_feedback_ratings WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, user_id FROM user_feedback ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_text) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_challenges WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 7 AND rating < 5;
SELECT challenge_name, completion_status FROM ar_challenges WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY challenge_id;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id IN (2, 5, 8) ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_challenges WHERE user_id = 3 AND feedback_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type FROM challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT user_id, challenge_name, feedback_text FROM user_feedback JOIN challenges ON user_feedback.challenge_id = challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, challenge_id, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT u.username, cf.challenge_name FROM users u JOIN user_feedback uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN challenges cf ON uf.challenge_id = cf.challenge_id WHERE u.join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cf.challenge_name, uf.feedback_text FROM challenges cf JOIN user_feedback uf ON cf.challenge_id = uf.challenge_id WHERE uf.feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY cf.challenge_name ASC;

SELECT u.username, c.challenge_type FROM users u JOIN user_feedback uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN challenges c ON uf.challenge_id = c.challenge_id WHERE c.difficulty_level < 4 ORDER BY u.username ASC, c.challenge_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as num_ratings FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_ratings > 10;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.challenge_name FROM users u INNER JOIN challenges c ON u.user_id = c.challenge_id WHERE c.challenge_difficulty = 'Hard'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.rating) AS total_ratings FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_ratings ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_ratings DESC

SELECT u.username, uf.feedback_text, cr.rating FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_feedback uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id LEFT JOIN user_ratings cr ON u.user_id = cr.user_id WHERE uf.rating IS NOT NULL AND cr.rating IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty FROM challenges ORDER BY difficulty DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT designer_name, company FROM game_designers WHERE designer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as num_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_feedback > 5;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty FROM challenges WHERE difficulty > 3 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT designer_name, company FROM game_designers WHERE company = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
